distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for harfbuzz fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-25193: Fixed vulnerability that allowed attackers to trigger O(n^2) growth via consecutive marks (bsc#1207922).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: hb-ot-layout-gsubgpos.hh in HarfBuzz through 6.0.0 allows attackers to trigger O(n^2) growth via consecutive marks during the process of looking back for base glyphs when attaching marks.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
